forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. Windy at times. High around 10C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Periods of rain early. Then some breaks in the clouds in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
